item.title: Durhack 2019
item.description: Our website created at DurHack 2019 Our project was to build a tool to help people with dementia remember things, this is implemented in various ways, as described below.

item.title: Making a new Website
item.description: For a long time this website has had a couple of links to contact me, but those days are over.
